Class PropertyVersionsBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.api.PropertyVersionsBuilder
public class PropertyVersionsBuilder extends Object
Builds PropertyVersions instances.
Since:
1.0-beta-1
Author:
Stephen Connolly

    • build

      public PropertyVersions build() throws VersionRetrievalException

      Creates a new instance of PropertyVersions, based on the values provided to the builder. The object is a mutable view on a property along with all its associated dependencies or plugins.

      The builder uses ResolverAdapter to resolve available versions for all associations.

      Returns:
      new PropertyVersions instance
      Throws:
      VersionRetrievalException - thrown if there are problems retrieving versions of artifacts linked with the property

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the property name
      Returns:
      property name

      includeLower - whether the lower bound should be included
